long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Invite Friend Request Manager extension is a special extension designed to help users manage and control the friend requests sent on the social networking platform Facebook. With this extension, users can easily view, edit and manage the list of friend requests in a convenient and efficient way.

1. View a list of friend requests: The extension will display a list of all friend requests sent on Facebook. You can view details about the invitation, including the recipient's name and image.

2. Bulk management: If you want to do bulk delete on friend requests, you can select multiple invitations at once and perform delete action
